<<!-- Navega√ß√£o entre os grupos -->
<div style="margin-top: 25px; display: flex; justify-content: center; gap: 20px;">
  <button onclick="prevGroup()" style="padding: 8px 16px;">Previous</button>
  <span id="group-indicator" style="align-self: center; font-weight: bold;">Group 1 of 10</span>
  <button onclick="nextGroup()" style="padding: 8px 16px;">Next</button>
</div>

<script>
  let currentGroup = 1;
  const totalGroups = 10;

  function setActivePill(index){
    document.querySelectorAll('.grp-btn[data-group]').forEach(btn=>{
      const n = Number(btn.getAttribute('data-group'));
      if(n === index){
        btn.classList.add('active');
        btn.setAttribute('aria-current','page');
      }else{
        btn.classList.remove('active');
        btn.removeAttribute('aria-current');
      }
    });
  }

  function setActiveGroupBox(index){
    for(let i=1;i<=totalGroups;i++){
      const box = document.getElementById(`group${i}`);
      if(!box) continue;
      box.style.display = (i===index)?'block':'none';
      box.classList.toggle('active', i===index);
    }
  }

  function showGroup(index){
    currentGroup = Math.max(1, Math.min(totalGroups, index));
    setActiveGroupBox(currentGroup);
    setActivePill(currentGroup);
    const ind = document.getElementById('group-indicator');
    if(ind) ind.textContent = `Group ${currentGroup} of ${totalGroups}`;
  }

  function nextGroup(){ if(currentGroup < totalGroups) showGroup(currentGroup+1); }
  function prevGroup(){ if(currentGroup > 1)        showGroup(currentGroup-1); }

  // iniciar no 1
  showGroup(currentGroup);
</script>
